content.p: , Chew Chun Yong completed his BSc (Hons) Actuarial Science from Universiti Tunku Abdul Rahman in 2010. He obtained his master degree from Universiti Malaya in 2016, focusing in the area of Group Theory. He completed his PhD from Universiti Tunku Abdul Rahman in 2024. His PhD research work was about the Generalised Lambert W function. He joined the Department of Applied Mathematics, University of Nottingham Malaysia Campus in August 2024. Actuarial and Financial Modelling, Excel and VBA models/add-ins development, Linux. Lectures taught in the past: Machine Learning Techniques for Data Mining, Advanced Actuarial Statistics, Actuarial and Financial Mathematics. Stochastic Processes, Mathematics for Engineering, Introduction to Ratemaking and Reserving, Complex Analysis, Partial Differential Equations, Financial Modelling, Discrete Mathematics. The Lambert W function and its generalisation. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
